00078 #ifndef INCLUDE_DATATYPES_H
00079 #define INCLUDE_DATATYPES_H
00080 
00081 #include<inet/arch/config.h>
00082 
00083 #ifdef MB90F553A
00084 
00085 #define BYTE    char                            
00086 #define WORD    unsigned short          
00087 #define LWORD   unsigned long           
00089 #define UINT8   char                            
00090 #define INT8    signed char                     
00091 #define UINT16  unsigned short          
00092 #define INT16   short                           
00093 #define UINT32  unsigned long           
00094 #define INT32   long                            
00096 #endif MB90F553A
00097 
00098 #endif
